title: Hellrider Longbow
content:
years ago. Longbow Two-Handed 18m 1.1 770

Hellrider Longbow

Heightened Awareness: Gain a +3 bonus to initiative rolls and Advantage on Perception Ability Checks.

Fiendish Fire: Once per turn, a creature hit by this weapon will possibly be afflicted with Faerie Fire.

Weapon Enchantment +1

Proficiency with this weapon type unlocks:

This longhorn was forged from the remnants of Stanislan the Silver's shield, found near the wreckage of Castle Ravenloft some years ago.
